nodes.text: Imperial medics were military personnel of the Galactic Empire who were responsible for providing first aid and frontline trauma care on the battlefield. In addition to droid helpers and Imperial Mobile Surgical Units—a model of prefabricated medcenters—the medics benefited from cutting-edge medical technology such as pain-relieving gas and antiseptic field projectors. Despite their status as healers, Imperial medics bore arms against aliens in combat, as the Empire interpreted the galaxy's ancient medical oaths as only applying to one's own species. Medics wore a distinctive white duty bicep band that bore a red symbol.
Imperial medics appeared in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story.
